app.navbar.title: RegKG
app.home.title: RegKG
app.home.subtitle: the regulatory knowledge graph
app.home.paraOne: The regulatory knowledge graph is a way to search and connect the regulatory information in Canada.
app.home.paraTwo: It's an open-source demonstration project, created to prove that the technology is suitable to the task. The information displayed in the application makes no representations about being complete, or up to date.
app.home.paraThree: It was produced by the Public Sector Experimentation (PSX) team at the Canada School of Public Service.
app.home.paraFour: If you have questions about the graph, want to contribute to it's improvement or deploy it yourself, please reach out to incubate.incuber@csps-efpc.gc.ca !
app.search.title: Search The Regulatory Knowledge Graph
app.search.introduction: The Knowledge Graph Search is powered with a flexible engine. You can search using simple terms like 'fishing', 'regulations' or even 'fishing regulations'. Try it out!
app.search.advancedQueries: If you would like to learn about advanced queries, here is a
app.query.errorGeneric: A problem arose when fetching search results. Please check your query and try again.
app.query.errorNoResults: Your search returned no results.  Please check your query and try again.
app.query.errorFailedToFetch: Network problem with server.  Please check your query and try again.
